00004 struct CutClearer{
00005   BaseModule* _parent;
00006   CutClearer(BaseModule* parent) : _parent(parent) {}
00007   std::istream& operator()(std::istream& in){
00008     _parent->ClearCuts();
00009     return in;
00010   }
00011 };

00013 struct DependencyAdder{
00014   BaseModule* _parent;
00015   DependencyAdder(BaseModule* parent) : _parent(parent){}
00016   std::istream& operator()(std::istream& in){
00017     std::string depmodule;
00018     in>>depmodule;
00019     _parent->AddDependency(depmodule);
00020     return in;
00021   }
00022 };

00024 BaseModule::BaseModule(const std::string& name, const std::string& helptext) : 
00025   ParameterList(name, helptext), _last_process_return(0)
00026 {
00027   RegisterParameter("enabled", enabled = true,
00028                     "Is this module enabled for this run?");
00029   RegisterParameter("skip_channels",_skip_channels,
00030                     "List the channels which we don't process");
00031   RegisterFunction(AddCutFunctor::GetFunctionName(), 
00032                    AddCutFunctor(this), AddCutFunctor(this),
00033                    "Add a cut which events must pass before processing");
00034   RegisterReadFunction("clear_cuts", CutClearer(this),
00035                        "Clear the list of defined cuts");
00036   RegisterReadFunction("add_dependency",DependencyAdder(this),
00037                        "List another module as a dependency");
00038   
00039 }

00041 BaseModule::~BaseModule()
00042 {
00043   
00044   //delete cuts
00045   for(size_t i=0; i < _cuts.size(); i++)
00046     delete _cuts[i];
00047   _cuts.clear();
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00051 int BaseModule::HandleEvent(EventPtr event, bool process_now)
00052 {
00053   // see if our cuts pass, and actually do the processing
00054   if(CheckCuts(event))
00055     _last_process_return = Process(event);
00056   else
00057     _last_process_return = 0;
00058   if(_last_process_return){
00059     Message(ERROR)<<"Module "<<GetName()<<" returns "
00060                   <<_last_process_return
00061                   <<" processing event "
00062                   <<event->GetRawEvent()->GetID()<<"\n";
00063   }
00064   return _last_process_return;    
00065 }
00066 
00067 int BaseModule::AddDependency(const std::string& module)
00068 {
00069   _dependencies.insert(module);
00070   return _dependencies.size();
00071 }
00072 
00073       
00074 bool BaseModule::CheckCuts(EventPtr event){
00075   
00076   for(std::vector<ProcessingCut*>::iterator cutit = _cuts.begin(); 
00077       cutit != _cuts.end(); cutit++){
00078     if((*cutit) -> Process(event->GetEventData()) == false)
00079       return false;
00080   }
00081   return true;
00082 }
00083 
00084 void BaseModule::ClearCuts()
00085 { 
00086   for(std::vector<ProcessingCut*>::iterator it = _cuts.begin(); 
00087       it != _cuts.end(); it++){
00088     delete *it;
00089   }
00090   _cuts.clear();
00091 }

00093 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, BaseModule::ChannelSkipper& ch)
00094 {
00095   out<<" ( ";
00096   for( std::set<int>::iterator it = ch.begin(); it != ch.end(); it++)
00097     out<<*it<<" ";
00098   out<<" ) ";
00099   return out;
00100 }
00101 
00102 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, BaseModule::ChannelSkipper& ch)
00103 {
00104   ch.clear();
00105   std::string temp="";
00106   while( in>>temp && temp != ")" && temp != "}" && temp != "]"){
00107     if(temp == "," || temp == "(" || temp == "[" || temp == "{" ) continue;
00108     int channel = atoi(temp.c_str());
00109     ch.insert(channel);
00110   }
00111   return in;
00112 }
